channel.title: Devops on Atakan Yenel
channel.description: Recent content in Devops on Atakan Yenel

item.title: Kyma VSCode plugin
item.description: Kyma is an open source project designed for kubernetes that allows you to extend your cloud-based enterprise applications. This plugin connects your VS Code with the Kyma and allows you to monitor or deploy your resources directly from the editor.

item.title: Predictive Auto Scaling Application
item.description: “PASSA (Predictive Auto Scaling Application) \”is an open source tool for scaling cloud applications at specific datetimes. It checks the state of applications and VMs on the cloud and notifies any inconsistencies between the desired state and the current deployed state.”
